fields_of_interest: Customs, Business and Industry, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Transport, Borders and Security
head_office_address: Rapiscan Systems Ltd X-ray House Bonehurst Road
eu_initiatives: Rapiscan has a particular interest in aviation security regulation, landside security regulation and policy, the proposal for the certification of aviation security equipment, maritime security, customs and border protection, explosives and drugs precursor regulations, explosives legislation, CBRNE initiatives
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

relevant_communication: Rapiscan has an interest in research projects and international capacity building projects related to security and detection.
goals__remit: Rapiscan Systems designs, develops and manufactures physical security equipment. Equipment includes x-ray systems, metal detectors, explosive detection systems, CBRNE detection equipment. Equipment is used in a number of applications including: aviation security, landside security screening, protection of critical infrastructure protection of public spaces, loss prevention, military force protection. The company goal is to become a leading supplier in this type of equipment and provide security to the public.
